title: ExploreSharePayload
description: Versioned payload for SQL Explorer shared URLs. Encoded as base64 JSON in the URL fragment (#q=<base64>). All payloads must include a version field.

v.description: Schema version. Current version is 1. Decoders should attempt best-effort parsing of unknown future versions.

ChartConfig.title: ChartConfig
ChartConfig.description: Plotly chart configuration. Omit entirely when chart is hidden.

type.description: Plotly trace type. 'line' is rendered as scatter with mode='lines'. 'whisker' renders a box plot from pre-computed quartile columns (q1, median, q3, lowerfence, upperfence).

x.description: Column name for the X axis.

y.description: Column name for the Y axis.

color.description: Column name to group traces by color. Null means no grouping.
